parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The timestamp when the monitoring ends.

parameters.name: MonitorType
parameters.description:
The metric type. The following metric types are supported:

\[Basic system metrics]

*   cpuUsage
*   memoryUsage
*   diskUsage
*   gcCount
*   gcTime

\[Nacos registry]

*   serviceCount
*   writeCostTime
*   readCostTime
*   TPS regCenterTps
*   QPS regCenterQps

\[Nacos configuration center]

*   publish
*   getConfig

\[zookeeper]

*   TPS zk_TpsCount
*   QPS zk_QpsCount
*   zookeeper_AvgRequestLatency

parameters.name: RequestPars
parameters.description: The extended request parameters in the JSON format.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The timestamp when the monitoring starts.

parameters.name: Step
parameters.description: The interval between data points. Unit: seconds.
